website_summaries.verdict: More than just a Bluetooth speaker, this little gadget plays music and tests your creativity. However, it's somewhat expensive and may have some quality issues.
pros: A good choice for budding artists and creative types, as it pairs with an app for creating pixel creations on the screen
Fun to change the designs to fit your preferences or the occasion
cons: Some models had issues – couldn't sync, didn't stay connected, or wouldn't hold a charge

customer_reviews.title: Unique alarm/speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love the product so far! I bought to mainly for the alarm purpose but the cool pixel art creation option as well as the pretty decent speaker quality sets it apart from cheaper options! I wish the battery life was slightly better but it’s nothing to knock it down a star!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound and so much FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little thing. The sound quality is amazing for a speaker so small. Battery life is excellent and the pixel art options are endless and so much fun. I got a great deal on the black model - I guess no one wants black but I love it. Can’t wait to see what Divoom has in store for us next.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Customizable Display And Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little device! I'm not sure what I expected, but it wasn't this! The display is vivid and fun, with a retro feel. The animations look great and the content is highly customizable. On top of that, it's actually a really good Bluetooth speaker! Was seriously surprised by the sound quality and the bass that this thing puts out! The app is a little funky and janky, but it works and isn't required once you finish customizing everything. All in all, I'm super pleased with the purchase and it's currently my favorite new little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Better Sound than Amazon Echo Spot
customer_reviews.text: I use the tivoo as an external Bluetooth speaker for my PSTV. The sound trumps the Echo Spot, way more bass. I normally use a head set for gaming but the PSTV doesn’t have a head phone jack so this is a work around without using a Bluetooth head set.
customer_reviews.author: Double Action

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and cute! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pixel products. They are really neat and definitely a pleaser as a present. They are really easy to control through an app and they have many different options for designs to have appear on the screen. I love using it for writing notes, quick one or two word phrases, and for decoration on my desk. What’s also a plus is the super cute baby pink color of the actual TV. I definitely recommend this product. I’m going to keep getting it as a birthday present for my relatives and friends. Super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: We'll see how long the battery lasts? Others on here had problems. Love this thing. So cute and sounds great. The app for android is actually easy to figure out. Bluetooth must be paired within the app. That's a negative but the app is needed for the radio function and controlling the built in mp3 player/tf card. Hope it lasts because I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: eric carney

customer_reviews.title: Battery life short. Very disappointed! Not what was advertised..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this because I was so excited to get it. Was very cute and looks very exciting but as I started to use it was very disappointed. The battery life is terrible. When the battery goes out especially in the middle the night, it makes a very loud sound that woke me up Two nights in a row.. The instructions are so tiny that my guinea pig might be able to read them. The app is impossible to use it very hard to understand. So it’s going back I have better things to do with my money on something that is not worth the issues or the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Retrofuturism at it's best.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the Divoom Timebox Mini in the past and now this one. They are pretty similar in quality. It feels sturdy and well put together. The Tivoo has added features and way more graphics it can handle. The controls are a little gimmicky. The front of the device has three controls. One is volume, one selecting audio source, and a selector of channels is very cool. If you love pixel art, this is for you. The audio quality is very good for a mini speaker as well. I love what this thing can do.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Im so happy...like a little kid :D
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product, saw it randomly on youtube, decided that if the sounds sucks, ill just use it as a prop in my youtube videos..BUT..sound is super super impressive, i honestly use it in my office as a speaker, bass is powerfull and sound very crisp....love ALL the funcitons that it has, use it as morning alarm....only bad thing is..now i have to have them all HAHA :D
customer_reviews.author: dusan jovic

customer_reviews.title: Cool but battery life is short
customer_reviews.text: It's very cool and there are tons of designs you can choose for the display. However, the battery only lasts for a day. I have to charge it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Divoom Tivoo Retro Bluetooth Speaker = LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: So, I am a bit of a tech nerd. I have all the latest current brand name items on my desk (i.e. smart speakers, small lights, hi-def cameras, etc.). These functional items and sometimes required. The “Divoom Tivoo Retro Bluetooth Speaker” is a must have desk accessory for anyone that appreciates the nostalgic past while bringing in the present needs of today (i.e. Bluetooth speaker, quality sound, etc.). At first I thought it just to be a “novelty” but it is sooooo much more than that. It is functional on all levels and looks fantastic! Job well done Divoom! Folks, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald T Herron

customer_reviews.title: Requires location permission...  why?
customer_reviews.text: I don't simply give phone permissions. It absolutely requires permission to get device location and files on the device. I can think of no reason why it would need location, so now I can't use the app, which means I can't customize the display unless I'm willing to let them poll my location. Update: More reasons to hate this device. You better setup your custom channel right the first time, because once you do you can't edit it again. The app is just plain bad.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Get it! It’s literally awesome and adorable.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It’s so much better built than I expected. Speakers are LOUD, really nice bass. The animations are so cool too. It’s so much better than the LaMetric (I have two of those too) and it’s way cheaper. I wouldn’t have bough lametric had I known about this product first. I saw it on someone’s tech vlog and thought it was awesome. Definitely a safe buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great design but not so great audio and battery.
customer_reviews.text: So I've had this speaker for a while its great its got alot of features But there were 2 major things that ruined it for me the battery is inconsistent on mine i would have the speaker in clock mode only and it bould die in the and sometimes it would last me 2 days max. The second part that annoyed me a bit was you cant really use an equalizer to put a bit more bass it will just lower the volume on the voice or the other instruments other than everything else was fine and the 3.5mm cable is really short and thin
customer_reviews.author: Sam7357

customer_reviews.title: COOL DEVICE!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a month or so and we love it. The kids like how it looks and it's easy to see the time at night, we can play music through it, and have the coolest designs on the screen. It's fun discovering all the creative things this tiny device can do - from changing the colors, to displaying the temperature, to changing the design that shows up, and we are constantly discovering different things it can do. Loving the connection it's creating with my 7 year old son as we play around with this innovative tech device. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fife

customer_reviews.title: Divoom Tivoo Pixel Art Speaker Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I amazed at the build quality, sound quality and just how well this Divoom Tivoo Pixel Art Bluetooth Speaker works. Connects to Android or iOS with no issues. Great for all ages who can operate a smart phone. I highly recommend this product. So much fun to use. I play music on it and the sound is very impressive from such a small product. The app allows you to do so much with it. Example: set multiple alarms, differnt screen art to choose from, soothing sounds to help you sleep with built in timer. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nim Nice

customer_reviews.title: More than meets the eyes and ears
customer_reviews.text: I’m continually impressed with Divoom’s offerings. From the clever packaging to the better than expected quality of materials, this tiny yet solid little “tv” has a lot more punch and bottom end than it physically looks like it can have. I just wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: porkloin2000

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Bluetooth speaker. The sound is crystal clear and it can get loud for its size. The pixel art/animation is amazing with the ability to control from phone (download the app) or from the speaker it self. It has games, alarm, sleep mode, create your own pixels, creat your own music and the list goes on. Once my friends saw this and what it can do they all bought one as well. You will be absoulty satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great personal sized device
customer_reviews.text: picks up your BT signal asap no issues with a pretty good range, I bought this for my wife to use for sitting outside in the morning drinking coffee her other one is much larger and has several cords, this is quicker and easier to use and if your'e not looking for super high volume it does pretty good, plus its kinda fun to play with, these make great presents
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Fun creative clock and speaker.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my speaker today. Works great! I had a few issues logging into the app but it downloaded fine and has a ton of fun features. I quickly figured out how to download images to it and its super cool that there is a comunity area where you can post your creations. I am looking forward to making animations of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pixel art, good sound, but the screen could be brighter
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid bluetooth speaker that sounds great and is combined with a 16x16 pixel art screen that plugs into the Divoom ecosystem. The pixel art options are awesome, with the ability to show animations, change with the music, act as a clock, tell you the weather, etc. My only complaint is that the screen isnt very bright and depending on your look angle and lighting in the room can be hard to see. I also have a Pixoo which has an AWESOME/bright screen. By contrat this one is a little disappointing. However, the price point is good considering you also get a great bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: ground_gainer

customer_reviews.title: Yeeeeeaaaasssssss!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure about this item because I was looking for something loud enough to fill a small apartment with sound but damn... now I understand the price you are paying for the aesthetic of a retro tv it’s cute but DAMNN this speaker is loud af and packaging was so cute too! It came in a sturdy plastic box with foam surrounding it so it’s well protected. This is a cute speaker great for an office or something
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: So cool, I have to buy more as gifts
customer_reviews.text: For tiny little thing it has incredible audio quality even as a Bluetooth speaker and for conference calls. Everybody that thinks it's the coolest thing in wants one. The quality of the pixels is about what you'd expect for something like this very 8-bit lo-fi. But I'll be damned if it isn't the coolest thing on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Tim90210

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is awesome to keep on your desk or in your living room. For as little as it is, the sound quality is actually pretty good (considering this thing is tiny). The speakers definitely pack a punch. The only bad thing about this little guy is the app used to control it, as i is kinda crumby and sometimes I set certain settings for the tivoo in the app and when i reopen the app those settings are back to default, which is kind of annoying. Definitely I fun little purchase however.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working After A Little While
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good for just about 15 months then it just died, completely stopped working. I searched online for a solution and there are many people experiencing the same problem with no fix
customer_reviews.author: Auth0rized

customer_reviews.title: App takes the fun out of it
customer_reviews.text: The device was great but your forced to use the app. To use the app you have to be online. You have to create an account and you have to tell it where exactly you are in this world and let it look at all your pictures. Do all that and it still doesn't work worth beans. I didn't want to return but I can't customize anything or even set the clock! Do yourself a favor and stay away. Google Play reviews on the app says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel K.

customer_reviews.title: Nerd Husband Approved
customer_reviews.text: My retro-loving husband loved this little thing. We also have multiple Bluetooth speakers around the house since he’s always listening to music. This little device has great sound and so many ways to personalize it. He has a fascination with Pixel art so this was the perfect gift for him!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Grate However...
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker the moment I 1st seen it. Has very nice sound and grate LED matrix. However not open source, cannot program matrix with 3rd party app or on a linux machine. Clunky almost unusable android app. If server go down or shutdown then what ever you have stored in memory on the speaker is what you got left.
customer_reviews.author: Xev_29a

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is great, software is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The device is awesome, but the software is pure garbage. I really wish that the app would be reworked to allow the ability to update your location for weather (can't), or that one channel would show the clock plus some different image animations (can't). You get a clock, date, temp, weather, and random pictures for the first channel. Found cool pictures to use for that first channel? Too bad. If you are looking at this as something to set on your desk, just wait for now until the app is updated or you will be frustrated as others are currently. Want an interesting bluetooth speaker? There are way better options for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Device
customer_reviews.text: I love my DIVOOM TIVOO. First off, the packaging it came in is extremely nice, which was a great tough. It came with cords, stickers, and even post cards included. Its small, but it is a perfect desk accessory. The brightness is very bright at the top setting and extremely adjustable which I appreciate because it allows me to turn the brightness down at night so that it doesn't light up my room. I also love that you can have the device rotate between the time, temp., weather, and several other screens. This works really well as a small alarm clock, which is how I currently use it. All in all, a great device with endless possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This little toy is really cool
customer_reviews.text: Found this listed on a "gadgets to own" video, and thought it looked interesting. It's a fun little toy, makes a great clock, and the speaker is surprisingly good, for the small size and inexpensive price. Sounds much better than any clock radio I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kosloske

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I watched the video review on the giveaways and it made it seem like it was great. Sound is not that good, not loud at all. When I try to play music in the app it doesn’t work. Can only play through airplay. It looks cool and quality seems good but that’s about it. Battery doesn’t last that long. I have to leave it plugged in so that at least it works like a night clock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristian M

customer_reviews.title: Great desk decoration!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from it being smaller than expected, it works great. I purely use this as a pixel art desk decoration rather than anything else, but all of its other functions are fun to use and handy to have. Pixel art is bright, flexible, and easy to switch around. It's retro TV design makes it a unique little gadget. Packaging was also very high quality. Will definitely add more of Divoom's products to my desk in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CozyDia

customer_reviews.title: Retro and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter only turns this off when sleeping, she loves it!! I love the colorful display, very awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: hotpepperdoll

customer_reviews.title: Cute but nobody cared
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but look, it’s just a speaker. Kids didn’t “get it” and haven’t spent any time with it. Adults might use it and think it’s cute. The app is not user friendly and not near as cool as I thought it would be. Really kind of a waste. Just buy a speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kymber Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect for pixel art.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this solely for pixel art display. Have not used sound or battery. For pixel art, overall it works great, only real complaint is lack of ability to repeat individual pixel X times or set duration before moving to next pixel art in series.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roadfeldt

customer_reviews.title: How can be a bluetooth speaker  so brilliant today?
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best electronic devices I have purchased for years. Of course everyone buy it for its pixel display, but I never imagine this can be so addictive to play with. The app allows you to create your own pixel arts and project it on the small screen, or share with users around the world. A very great idea to allow people not only interact with their own devices but the real user community. And it has been in the market for almost two years (how could I miss it?)! Good sound quality (from a layman's perspective).
customer_reviews.author: KaguyaSama

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it is so beautiful, the material of the box is very resistant plastic I use it to transport it the only bad thing is that it does not have a safety cover is removed very easily, the horn at maximum volume without equalizing distorts and emits a shrieking and annoying sound, it is only for small spaces, the battery runs out very fast if you leave it with the animation it consumes a lot of energy, obviously it is only for entertainment, I would love to buy another two more soon.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product died within six months
customer_reviews.text: I've had the device for less than six months when all of suddenly it died with no way to turn it back on. Trying to get support from Divoom is a lost cause they have little to no way to be able to contact them for support.
customer_reviews.author: Wave Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Vast creative outlet
customer_reviews.text: This thing was originally purchased as aprop for inside my custom pc but now it’s much more once I realized its capabilities. If you have kids between 5 and 15 this would be a great gift for them
customer_reviews.author: Jason stewart

customer_reviews.title: Grate item u can’t just have one !!!!!!!! We love them so much we have to get more
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much we are going to order more love the retro look and the silky shiny finish !!! The sound will blow your mind and the colors on the pixel are awesome !!!!!!!!!! I just order the Tivoo max white for my living room ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!

customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, well made and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Sounds big for its small cartoon appearance. Easy to use and encourages exploration. Have given as gifts to a 20 something and a 60 something, both loved it. Probably the best $50 dollar gift out there for an iPhone owner.
customer_reviews.author: Recently there

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves it!

When I go visit him he usually has it playing and will bring it along in the car to use instead of his radio on road trips. I’m so glad I got this for him!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on for my office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put it on my office desk to add a funny touch while having the clock functionality. I love the TV shape, you can even setup different "channels" with some specific information or just a funny art. You can create your own or select one of the hundreds available through the app. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: NOVEL!! CUTE!!! FUN!!!

customer_reviews.title: Recommend

But once he opened it and put it together, it ended up making me want one too! It’s so cute and weirdly makes you happy getting to personalize it and make it your own. I recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teenage son. He absolutely loved it. He carries it around everywhere, the speaker is quite powerful for such a small device (better than my own bluetooth speaker). Will buy one for my daughter who now very much wants one.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little speaker!

customer_reviews.author: Deeann

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, crisp, clear sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very impressive! Would never think such a small speaker could produce such amazing, quality sound. More than just a speaker - alarm, stop watch, temperature, weather, create music, play games,tons of pixel art.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not without issue
customer_reviews.text: So I want to say I really enjoy this speaker, from ascetic to function. That being said I bought this about 8 or so months ago, and I would have given that one 5 stars, however it died without a clear reason. So I buy a replacement, works well enough... The problem is the LEDs have a blue shift that is very noticeable which left me questioning their quality control and keeps me from giving 5 stars. Overall cute useful device, but it might be a mixed bag.

customer_reviews.title: We’ll worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing has lasted me years as my main speaker for my small bedroom. It’s not perfect, and it’s not necessary/ But it sounds great for the size, and there’s nothing else like it. It just looks good

customer_reviews.title: Good quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she has been really impressed with the overall quality of this speaker. Surprisingly good and loud sound, solid build it feels high quality in your hand, and it has a lot of software features that give you some fun. The packaging is very nice as well.
